(Simplified: 鳓)
Chinese Definition:
①(鰳魚)身體側扁，腹部有硬刺，生活在海中，爲重要食用魚類。亦稱“鱠魚”、“白鱗魚”、“曹白魚”。

鰳字的基本解释

鰳
lè
见“鳓”。

鰳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lè］
［《篇海類編》歷得切］
“鳓1”的繁体字。
名鲙鱼、白鳞鱼、曹白鱼。鱼纲鲱科。身体侧扁，银白色。头小，鳃孔大。无侧线，无须。生活在海中。是一种重要的食用鱼类。

鰳字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鰳； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1476第31
【篇海】歷得切，音勒。【正字通】鰳魚以四月至海上，漁人聽水聲取之。狀如鰣魚，小首細鱗，腹下有硬刺，乾曰鰳鯗。

鰳字的源字形

鰳字的起名意思

鰳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lè］
["Pianhai Leibian" Li Deqi]
"鳓1" in traditional characters.
The names are mackerel, white leopard, and white fish. Fish class Herring family. The body is flat and silvery white. The head is small and the gill openings are large. No side line, no need. Live in the sea. It is an important edible fish.
鰳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鰳; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1476 Page 31
[Pianhai] The history is cut, and the sound is Le. [Zhengzitong] The fish are taken from April to the sea, and the fishermen listen to the sound of the water. It looks like an anchovy, with small heads with fine scales and hard spines under its abdomen.
